documents.document:
“This creature who skins women has sworn to cut my heart out, & I mean to make him answer for those words.”
Jon Snow http://t.co/ohtLEx95hc

“Do you want to die old and craven in your bed?”
“How else? Though not till I’m done reading.”
-Asha Greyjoy & Rodrik Harlaw #WorldBookDay
“A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies,” said Jojen. “The man who never reads lives only one.” #WorldBookDay http://t.co/gKBOPqUiSg
RT @MattyDudding: @SerASOIAF think I've found my new favourite twitter account. You forget how many fantasic quotes there are from the books

“I am Alayne, Father. Who else would I be?”
“With my wits & Cat’s beauty, the world will be yours, sweetling.” http://t.co/ZVJNYVhM5X

“Give me back my spear, Uncle. Cersei sent us a head. We should send her back a bag of them.”
-Obara Sand #asoiaf http://t.co/v41FyQsIsD

"You have no high ground here, no walls to hide beyond, no natural defenses."
"Yet."
-Theon & Stannis #BattleOfIce http://t.co/b8q5xnEq0F
RT @LanniLancel: Go follow @SerASOIAF he has the best quotes ever

“This is a game to him, mildly diverting. Some men hunt, some hawk, some tumble dice. Roose plays with men.”
Barbrey http://t.co/i0GFF4ihaD
The show is better. #OffendEveryoneIn4Words http://t.co/4YuHE3fKYq

“Men of honor will do things for their children that they would never consider doing for themselves.”
-Petyr Baelish http://t.co/pWwJOWDcUC

“Bring my eggs,” Dany commanded her handmaids. Something in her voice made them run.
#funeralpyre #HappyEaster http://t.co/HU5Ub85yIM

“What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger.”
-Aeron Greyjoy #HappyEaster #ZombieJesus http://t.co/OkYC7sUolh

“Be glad the gods made seven hells. One would never be enough to hold both of the Cleganes.”
-Jaime #asoiaf http://t.co/QKUoNAuil2

“What is our heart’s desire?”
“Vengeance. Justice. Fire and blood.”
-Arianne & Doran Martell #asoiaf http://t.co/2fDhpmW7NP

“As you wish, ser. And now if you will excuse me, Littlefinger’s bastard must find her lord father.”
-Alayne Stone http://t.co/9v6SVbdBoE
RT @ThroneGirl2: @SerASOIAF I love your account! Thanks for always bringing the best #ASOIAF #quotes

Lady Dustin parted her lips in a thin, feral smile. “The north remembers, Frey.”
-Barbrey Dustin #AprilFreysDay http://t.co/tLX9Ue3oG6

“Only a fool makes threats he’s not prepared to carry out.”
-Jaime Lannister #asoiaf #AprilFreysDay http://t.co/mBcUfitXMp
“The Twins took up the Young Wolf’s cause as well, then betrayed him. That makes you twice as treacherous as Piper.” http://t.co/hHZPC8tQqp

“Put up your steel, ser! Are you a Corbray or a Frey? We are guests here.”
-Bronze Yohn Royce #asoiaf #AprilFreysDay http://t.co/BSIEQIxPcX
You’re a treacherous lying weasel, like all your kin. I’d sooner drink a pint of piss than take the word of any Frey. http://t.co/dcqMqK85aT

“Ser, may I have your name?”
“Ser Jared, of House Frey.”
“Jared of House Frey, I name you liar.”
#AprilFreysDay http://t.co/sCj1i8lWq2

“You’d never dare hang a Frey.” Yellow cloak laughed. “The pimply boy, he said the same thing.”
#AprilFreysDay http://t.co/41plqSAv2b

“Say that with a sword in your hand, Frey, or do you only fight with smears of shit?”
-Clement Piper #AprilFreysDay http://t.co/6e0YKM154u

“Maybe I never saw a camel, but I know a camel’s cunt when I smell one.”
-Cat of the Canals #asoiaf #GoTSeason5 http://t.co/La2D1evGTe

“The greatest fools are ofttimes more clever than the men who laugh at them.”
-Tywin Lannister #asoiaf http://t.co/sIpMnUTdpS

“The gods are not done with me.” He pulled the glove from his left hand. “Lord Ramsay is not done with me.”
-Theon http://t.co/KnTnWMiYMv

If you support the "religious freedom" bill signed in Indiana- please unfollow this account.
#BoycottIndiana http://t.co/d6kiiAF7ha

Perhaps I cannot make my people good, she told herself, but I should at least try to make them a little less bad.
-Daenerys #BoycottIndiana

Remember who you are,what you were made to be. Remember your words.
“Fire & Blood,” Daenerys told the swaying grass. http://t.co/oXIo0AzGbL
"On the Wall, a man gets what he earns. You're no ranger, Jon, only a green boy w/the smell of summer still on you." http://t.co/T2HVZUzf0j

Many called her beautiful. She was not beautiful. She was red, and terrible, and red.
-Maester Cressen #asoiaf http://t.co/4Kjmkyt0v5

“The north remembers, Lord Davos. The north remembers, & the mummer’s farce is almost done. My son is home.”
-Wyman http://t.co/ImDxMxkLfC

“Gold shall be their crowns and gold their shrouds.”
-Maggy the Frog #maegi #asoiaf http://t.co/QqSNFAbhgj

“Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy & let the man be born.”
-Aemon #GoTSeason5 #episode5 http://t.co/R24cQSzwBr
We are puppets dancing on the strings of those come before us, & one day our own children will take up our strings. http://t.co/eDR8Db3tWk

“Her father got this child on her? I will not suffer such abominations here. This is not King's Landing.”
-Stannis http://t.co/rCwnHOj7jn
The dragon has three heads. There are two men in the world who I can trust. We will be three against the world, like Aegon and his sisters. https://t.co/yvwiONLzsA

“Someday I will teach you the meaning of “ill luck,” the queen had vowed.
-Cersei Lannister #asoiaf #Friday13th https://t.co/2NOtT4SpVO

“The winters are hard,” Ned admitted. “But the Starks will endure. We always have.”
-Eddard Stark #asoiaf #MerryChristmas https://t.co/hvq1auCubf

“He was the blood of the dragon, but now his fire has gone out. He was Aemon Targaryen. And now his watch is ended.”
#ripPeterVaughan https://t.co/9AmCk5TGra
He pointed at Robb with the blade. “There sits the only king I mean to bow my knee to, m’lords,” he thundered. “The King in the North!” https://t.co/ZE5PsExMbt

“The bad cat was outside my window last night, but Ser Pounce hissed at him & he ran off across the roofs.”
-Tommen #NationalCatDay https://t.co/824rTRXlV0
⬆️Check out the @WesterosHistory podcast for the best analysis of Old Nan's old stories!! https://t.co/ind5WchSzQ

“Monsters are dangerous beasts, and just now kings seem to be dying like flies.”
-Tyrion Lannister #whatkingwilldienextseason? https://t.co/tgRBbf1NH1
RT @LordSnow: You know nothing, Donald Trump. #Debate
“It is no matter to them if the high lords play their game of thrones so long as they are left in peace.” He gave a shrug. “They never are.”

Remember who you are,what you were made to be. Remember your words.
“Fire & Blood” Daenerys told the swaying grass. https://t.co/kAr1JzBOzz

He was no dragon, Dany thought, curiously calm. Fire cannot kill a dragon.
#asoiaf #NeverTrump https://t.co/6gJWkIofdj

“Only death may pay for life.”
#asoiaf #TWOW? https://t.co/Pn7TL6GX7b
In a throne above them sat a dead man with the head of a wolf. He wore an iron crown & held a leg of lamb in 1 hand. https://t.co/JXQDs6nS3a
You will never know how sick it makes me to see you here, Kingslayer. You will never know how much I despise you. https://t.co/fpgjfSj9Hv

“Your men did what they were sworn to do, Robb. Grieve for them. Honor them for their valor.”
-Catelyn #MemorialDay https://t.co/UrsfIohTz2
The traitors want my city, but I’ll give them naught but ashes. Let Robert be king over charred bones & cooked meat. https://t.co/MjE1TX8Af2
You cannot speak to him, try as you might. The past remains the past. We can learn from it, but we cannot change it. https://t.co/l2D4NFWRu3

“I swear it by earth & water.”
“I swear it by bronze & iron.”
“We swear it by ice & fire,” they finished together. https://t.co/eqHbmuiEvn
“Balon is dead! Yet a king will come again! For what is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger!” https://t.co/ob5u2oiEz8
RT @gamofphoto: Woow 4000! Yaaay! @SerASOIAF

“Bring on your storm, my lord—and recall, if you do, the name of this castle.”
-Cortnay Penrose #asoiaf #badass http://t.co/1DcbWP3cRy

“No one has ever tried to eat my worm before,” he said. “Are you hungry, child?”
Yes, she thought, but not for food. http://t.co/BDMaXE1SGd
“Every time a Targaryen is born, the gods toss the coin in the air & the world holds its breath to see how it lands.” http://t.co/hFwyIKmFrh

“Where are the rest of you?”
“In the world that men have made, there is no room for us.”
-Bran & Leaf #EarthDay http://t.co/MzXCwSFyTG

“Make her spread her legs for you as well. The best part of me for the best part of her, a fair trade.”
-Tyrion http://t.co/4UFozxHWIJ

“You call us fools? We’re not the ones who got chosen as the 998th Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch.”
-Pyp http://t.co/q4rRhAZ0m5

Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is STARK.
-Lyanna Mormont #asoiaf #TheNorthRemembers http://t.co/YmbltlrTLV

“I just want to say to whoever is voting for me that I would certainly make an awful Lord Commander. But so would all these others.”
-Edd
“The same question is on every tongue—what will Doran do? What will his brother do to avenge our murdered prince?” http://t.co/LOUiDD3wKF

"We were king’s men, knights, & heroes.. but some knights are dark & full of terror, my lady. War makes monsters of us all."
-Thoros of Myr
“You need only bend your knee, pledge yourself to my service, & you shall rise as Jon Stark, the Lord of Winterfell.” http://t.co/CE9kx2eowT
RT @ASOIAFReadThru: "Promise me, Ned." “I promise, Robert” 'Promise me, Ned', Lyanna’s voice echoed.

“If Daenerys is no more than a sweet young girl, the Iron Throne will cut her into sweet young pieces.”
-Tyrion http://t.co/t59XRf9QfF
“It is always cold on the Wall” “You think so?” “I know so,my lady.” “Then you know nothing, Jon Snow.”she whispered. http://t.co/mSFnooHG2v

"Some gave me soft words and some blunt, some made excuses, some promises, some only lied. In the end words are just wind."
-Davos #asoiaf

“This is the first of my soldiers they have slain.” “The first,” Ser Barristan warned,“but not the last.”
-Daenerys http://t.co/CuWQnt3os7

So the girl is as clever as she is pretty. Tommen could do a deal worse for a queen. Others have.
-Jaime #asoiaf http://t.co/YkEberX4GN
“Laws should be made of iron, not of pudding. Mance Rayder’s life is forfeit by every law of the Seven Kingdoms.” http://t.co/j0CJH3j9el
“Queen you shall be … until comes another, younger & more beautiful, to cast you down & take all that you hold dear.” http://t.co/yV4dPFSk4k

“Why is it always the innocents who suffer most, when you high lords play your Game of Thrones?”
-Varys #TONIGHT http://t.co/gRVpfpSbqU

“No!” He put his horse between Arianne & the crossbows. “You will not take her whilst I still draw breath.”
-Arys http://t.co/iglICXklRB

“We won’t tell Jon we’re coming, we’ll just be there one day, you & me. It will be an adventure.”
“An adventure.” http://t.co/mv6kBakz6V

I have my swords, thought Jon Snow, and we are coming for you, Bastard.
#asoiaf #pinkletter http://t.co/Cp71T0L30j
Daenerys Targaryen rose, & for the first time in hundreds of years, the night came alive with the music of dragons. http://t.co/j6YnaIWEVW

“He pointed to the spear, then to my mother’s tears, and I picked up the spear.”
-Obara Sand #asoiaf http://t.co/azkPJxOYif

“I am not without mercy,” thundered he who was notoriously without mercy.
-Stannis Baratheon #mercilesswithgrammar http://t.co/s6P9qbu6Qn

“I dreamed about the queen… but she mistook me for my brother, Jaime, and fed me to her dragons.”
-Tyrion #asoiaf http://t.co/ShSZCbS2Nw
“So I had him hanged & claimed my rights beneath the tree where he was swaying. The wench was hardly worth the rope.” http://t.co/1VhQY3GmWi

“Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy and let the man be born.”
-Aemon Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/1Oni5UKfKW

The Mother gives the gift of life, & watches over every wife. Her gentle smile ends all strife, & she loves her children.
-Song of the 7

“All these kings would do a deal better if they would put down their swords and listen to their mothers.”
-Olenna Redwyne #HappyMothersDay

“The king is my son!”
“Aye, & from what I saw of Joffrey, you are as unfit a mother as you are a ruler”
-Kevan http://t.co/jQNKZLkYO8
“They took Ned, & your sweet brothers. Sansa is married, Arya is lost… if anything befell you, I would go mad, Robb.” http://t.co/NY1xHUAqCP
“You will never know how sick it makes me to see you [here], Kingslayer. You will never know how much I despise you.” http://t.co/1juT2s9kun

“You’ll want your child, I expect.I’ll send him to you when he’s born. With a trebuchet.”
Jaime #meanwhileinthebooks http://t.co/BK3rdVKmF6

“I think life is a jape. Yours, mine, everyone’s.”
-Tyrion & Jorah #asoiaf http://t.co/ukRlHhiCXH

Prince Rhaegar loved his Lady Lyanna, and thousands died for it.
-Barristan Selmy #asoiaf #R+L=J http://t.co/nq5v4EFNv5
